```{r diving-setup, include = FALSE}
source("common.R")
ds4p_funyoutube <- read.csv("admin/csv/ds4p_funyoutube.csv", sep = "")
ds4p_urls <- read.csv("./admin/csv/ds4p_urls.csv")
```

# Deeper Diving into ggplot2

```{r diving-include-1, echo=FALSE}
# 503
"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xLBMJMkwc-U" %>%
  embed_url() %>%
  use_align("center")
```

You can follow along with the slides [here][d13b_moreggplot] if you would like to open them full-screen.

```{r diving-include-2, echo=FALSE}
slide_url(ds4p_urls, "d13b_moreggplot") %>%
  include_url(height = "400px")
```
